text: From James, a slave of God and the Lord Jesus Christ, to the twelve tribes dispersed abroad. Greetings!
My brothers and sisters, consider it nothing but joy when you fall into all sorts of trials,

because you <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754">that</st> the <st data-num="1383" class="">testing</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="2716" class="">produces</st> <st data-num="5281" class="">endurance</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> let <st data-num="5281" class="">endurance</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> its <st data-num="5046" class="">perfect</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">effect</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> you will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="5046" class="">perfect</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3648" class="">complete</st>, <st data-num="3367" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3007" class="">deficient</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">anything</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> is <st data-num="3007" class="">deficient</st> in <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st>, he should <st data-num="154" class="">ask</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, who <st data-num="1325" class="">gives</st> to <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="574" class="">generously</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">without</st> <st data-num="3679" class="">reprimand</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> it will be <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he must <st data-num="154" class="">ask</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">without</st> <st data-num="1252" class="">doubting</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> the one who <st data-num="1252" class="">doubts</st> is <st data-num="1503" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="2830" class="">wave</st> of the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st>, <st data-num="416" class="">blown</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4494" class="">tossed around</st> <st data-num="416" class="">by the wind</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1565">that</st> <st data-num="444" class="">person</st> must <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3633" class="">suppose</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he will <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>,
since he is a double-minded individual, unstable in all his ways.
Now the believer of humble means should take pride in his high position.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="4145">rich person’s</st> pride should be <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5014" class="">humiliation</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> he will <st data-num="3928">pass away</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="438" class="">wildflower</st> in the <st data-num="5528" class="">meadow</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="2246" class="">sun</st> <st data-num="393" class="">rises</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> its <st data-num="2742" class="">heat</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3583" class="">dries up</st> the <st data-num="5528" class="">meadow</st>; the <st data-num="438">petal of the flower</st> <st data-num="1601" class="">falls off</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="2143" class="">beauty</st> is <st data-num="622" class="">lost</st> forever.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3779" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> the <st data-num="4145" class="">rich person</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the midst of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4197" class="">pursuits</st> will <st data-num="3133">wither away</st>.

<st data-num="3107" class="">Happy</st> is the <st data-num="435" class="">one</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="5278" class="">endures</st> <st data-num="3986" class="">testing</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> when he <st data-num="1096" class="">has</st> <st data-num="1384">proven to be genuine</st>, he will <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> the <st data-num="4735" class="">crown</st> of <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> God<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1861" class="">promised</st> to those who <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="3004" class="">Let</st> <st data-num="3367">no one</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> when he is <st data-num="3985" class="">tempted</st>, “I am <st data-num="3985" class="">tempted</st> <st data-num="575" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,” <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><st data-num="551"> cannot be tempted</st> by <st data-num="2556" class="">evil</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="3985" class="">tempts</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1538">each one</st> is <st data-num="3985" class="">tempted</st> when he is <st data-num="1828" class="">lured</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1185" class="">enticed</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="1939" class="">desires</st>.

<st data-num="1534" class="">Then</st> when <st data-num="1939" class="">desire</st> <st data-num="4815" class="">conceives</st>, it <st data-num="5088">gives birth</st> to <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> when <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> is <st data-num="658">full grown</st>, it <st data-num="616">gives birth</st> to <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>.

Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="4105">led astray</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="27" class="">dear</st> <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3956" class="">All</st> <st data-num="18" class="">generous</st> <st data-num="1394" class="">giving</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="5046" class="">perfect</st> <st data-num="1434" class="">gift</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510">is</st> <st data-num="509" class="">from above</st>, <st data-num="2597">coming down</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> of <st data-num="5457" class="">lights</st>, <st data-num="3844" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> there <st data-num="1762" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="3883" class="">variation</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="5157" class="">slightest hint</st> of <st data-num="644" class="">change</st>.<n id="3" />
By his sovereign plan he gave us birth through the message of truth, that we would be a kind of firstfruits of all he created.
Understand this, my dear brothers and sisters! Let every person be quick to listen, slow to speak, slow to anger.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="435" class="">human</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3709" class="">anger</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2038" class="">accomplish</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1352" class="">So</st> <st data-num="659">put away</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4507" class="">filth</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2549" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="4050" class="">excess</st> and <st data-num="4240" class="">humbly</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1209" class="">welcome</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> <st data-num="1721" class="">implanted</st> within you, which is <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">souls</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1096">be</st> sure you <st data-num="4163">live out</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3441">merely</st> <st data-num="202" class="">listen</st> to it and so <st data-num="3884" class="">deceive</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st>.

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="202">merely listens</st> to the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4163" class="">live</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">it</st> <st data-num="4163" class="">out</st>, he is <st data-num="1503" class="">like</st> <st data-num="435" class="">someone</st><n id="1" /> who <st data-num="2657">gazes at</st> <st data-num="846">his</st> <st data-num="1078">own</st> <st data-num="4383">face</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="2072" class="">mirror</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> he <st data-num="2657" class="">gazes at</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> then <st data-num="565">goes out</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2112" class="">immediately</st> <st data-num="1950" class="">forgets</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3697">what sort of person</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the one who <st data-num="3879" class="">peers</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="5046" class="">perfect</st> <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> of <st data-num="1657" class="">liberty</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3887" class="">fixes</st> his <st data-num="3887" class="">attention</st> there,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="4162" class="">does</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> a <st data-num="1953" class="">forgetful</st> <st data-num="202" class="">listener</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> one who <st data-num="4163" class="">lives</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">it</st> <st data-num="4163" class="">out</st>—<st data-num="3778">he</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3107" class="">blessed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> what <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="4162" class="">does</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="1380" class="">thinks</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2357" class="">religious</st> yet does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5468" class="">bridle</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1100" class="">tongue</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">and so</st> <st data-num="538" class="">deceives</st> <st data-num="846">his</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st>, <st data-num="3778" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2356" class="">religion</st> is <st data-num="3152" class="">futile</st>.
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their adversity and to keep oneself unstained by the world.
